name: WebGLRenderingContext.getAttachedShaders
description: The WebGLRenderingContext.getAttachedShaders() method of the WebGL API returns a list of WebGLShader objects attached to a WebGLProgram.

refs.name: WebGL 1.0
refs.description: The definition of 'getAttachedShaders' in the 'WebGL 1.0' specification.
